function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Movement restrictions leading to unemployment","Impact":"Millions of people unemployed, with more at risk of job loss","Mitigation":"Provide financial support, job retraining, and employment opportunities","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Unemployed individuals, businesses","Owner":"Government, businesses"},{"Description":"Unprecedented national debt from support packages","Impact":"Uncertainty around the effect on public services and taxes","Mitigation":"Strategic economic planning, debt management","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public, taxpayers","Owner":"Government, economic experts"},{"Description":"Long-term effects on mental health due to pandemic-related unemployment","Impact":"Long-term mental health effects on individuals","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support, community programs","Technologies":"Telehealth, mental health apps","People":"Unemployed individuals, society","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers"}]}
